question: Walking at the rate of 4 km an hour, a man covers a certain distance in 3 hours 45 minutes. If he covers the same distance on cycle, cycling at the rate of 16.5 km/hr, the time taken by him is :
explanation:
Distance covered on foot $latex = 4\\times 3\\frac{3}{4}km = 15km&s=1$
âˆ´ Time taken on cycle $latex = \\frac{Distance}{Speed} = \\frac{15}{16.5}hour&s=1$
$latex = \\frac{15\\times 60}{16.5}minutes&s=1$
$latex = 54.55 minutes$
Hence option [B] is correct answer
